thread.title: Hey Varun, Jacqueline and Taapsee, you have to get these things right in Oonchi hai building and Chalti hai kya nau se barah remakes
thread.title_full: Hey Varun, Jacqueline and Taapsee, you have to get these things right in Oonchi hai building and Chalti hai kya nau se barah remakes

author: Karan Shah
title: Hey Varun, Jacqueline and Taapsee, you have to get these things right in Oonchi hai building and Chalti hai kya nau se barah remakes
text:
Jacqueline Fernandez Hey Varun, Jacqueline and… Hey Varun, Jacqueline and Taapsee, you have to get these things right in Oonchi hai building and Chalti hai kya nau se barah remakes Varun Dhawan, Jacqueline Fernandez and Taapsee Pannu are all set to recreate Oonchi Hai Building and Chalti Hai Kya Nau Se Barah in Judwaa 2... By Karan Shah | Published: February 2, 2017 8:45 pm Salman Khan, Aamir Khan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Saif Ali Khan: Celebs spotted at airport 
We told you earlier how the makers of Judwaa 2 are planning to recreate two iconic songs – Oonchi Hai Building and Chalti Hai Kya Nau Se Barah from the original movie. Yes, we will see Varun Dhawan , Jacqueline Fernandez and Taapsee Pannu groove to these numbers in the sequel. However after a few recreated songs like Humma Humma ( OK Jaanu ) and Teri Fariyaad (Tum Bin 2 ) failing to live up to the expectations, everyone have now become against this trend. So Varun, Jackie and Taapsee will have to recreate the right moves and the makers will have to hit the right notes to make these two iconic songs successful. 
If recreating two iconic hits from the 90s was not challenging enough, Varun and team Judwaa 2 have to fill the shoes of Salman Khan , Karisma Kapoor and Rambha. All the three actors had put up really energetic and tremendous performances in Judwaa , so it will be difficult for Varun, Jackie and Taapsee to match them. However, it isn’t impossible! Here are a few things we want them to get right in Judwaa 2 : 
# Energy 
If you see Oonchi Hai Building and Chalti Hai Kya Nau Se Barah , you will realise that Salman, Karisma and Rambha dance with a lot of energy. Varun, Jackie and Taapsee will have to match up to that level of energy to keep up with the fast beats. Difficult but not impossible. 
# Expressions 
Salman showcases a range of expressions and emotions in both the songs. Mind you, Salman had to play two contrasting characters and behave accordingly too. While Varun has a lot of talent, he will have a hard time recreating those complex set of expressions. ALSO READ – Varun Dhawan, Jacqueline Fernandez and Taapsee Pannu to kickstart Judwaa 2 with a special song – read details 
# Dance moves 
The dance steps in both the songs were unique when they released. This caught the audience’s attention and made the dance numbers big hits. Varun, Jacqueline and Taapsee will have to come up with some new and unique moves too. ALSO READ – Not Just Salman Khan, Karishma Kapoor will also have a cameo in Varun Dhawan-Jacqueline Fernandez’s Judwaa 2 
Judwaa 2 goes on floor tomorrow and they will shoot for Chalti Hai Kya Nau Se Barah first. Well, we can’t wait to see the trio recreate the two iconic hits. Share with us your thoughts in the comments section below!
